game.name: The Book of Shadows
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: What happens when you and your girlfriend uncover a mysterious book and then accidentally activate it? Can you keep Alex one step ahead of those who want the book while at the same time figure out where am I? What does this book do? Why do these other people want it?
game.shortDescriptionEn: What happens when you and your girlfriend uncover a mysterious book and then accidentally activate it? Can you keep Alex one step ahead of those who want the book while at the same time figure out where am I? What does this book do? Why do these other people want it?
